alias._instruction: Enter an user-defined identifier, often a short name, of this annotation.

bestViewPoint._instruction: Add a coordinate point identifying the best view of this annotation in space.

criteria._instruction: Add a protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to produce this annotation.

criteriaType._instruction: Add the type of criteria used to define this annotation (processive or asserted).

displayColor._instruction: Enter the preferred display color (RGB) of the related annotation.

inspiredBy._instruction: Add one or several (source) image(s) that inspired the definition of this annotation.

internalFileIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this annotation within the file it is stored in.

laterality._instruction: Add the side(s) of the body or bilateral organ that this annotation is defined in.

namingTerm._instruction: Add one or several anatomical entities (term(s)) that name this annotation.

relatedAtlasTerm._instruction: Add one or several anatomical entities (term(s)) of a brain atlas annotation to which this annotation is related to.

visualizedIn._instruction: Add the image in which this annotation is visualized in.
